name: Block Breaker (Henry Pitman)
description:
How To Play:

  • Click the left mouse button to launch the ball
  • Move the mouse left and right to move the paddle
  • Don't let the ball fall past the paddle!
  • Use the paddle's chamfers to skillfully change the ball's trajectory!

Info: Original project from the Complete Unity Developer course by GameDev.tv on Udemy. I've extended it's functionality to make it play more like a game.
